name: Hat&Mathics
description:
Hat&Mathics is a kind a bit like the show "Countdown" but with cards.

Do math operations with the cards in your hand to get the exact result on the top of the screen.

  • If you make a mistake, you can use "R" to restart the same game
  • If you don't find the solution, you can use "N" to start a new game
  • Take your time, there is no timer
